values: To improvise something is to do it with whatever is available or without planning.
There was no meat for the pizza, so we improvised with what was in the fridge.
vt.即兴创作；临时准备，临时凑成
v. to speak or perform without preparation 即兴创作
vt. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供 vi. 即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合
v. 即兴表演，即兴创作；临时做，临时凑成
vt.& vi.即兴创作,临时提供，临时凑成
vt. & vi. 临时制作, 临时凑成时 态: improvised, improvising, improvises 名 词: improviser
